title: Epic: GRIN IR and Core→GRIN translation
body:
Implement the GRIN IR following the "Modern GRIN" dialect (Hruska et al., 2020). Define Core→GRIN translation for thunks, partial applications, and constructors. Clear interfaces at the Core/GRIN boundary.

**Key decisions**: #5, #20, #21 in DESIGN.md
**Sub-tasks to split later**: GRIN IR types, Core→GRIN translation, pretty-printer
